item.title: Gitleaks
item.description: I’ve put in some effort in recent months to remove secrets from multiple legacy code bases. That was the easy part, the though part is to change culture to prevent new secrets from leaking into the codebase in the future. Luckily there are tools to help out with that: Gitleaks was a cool finding. It helps to find secrets before you commit them using different regular expressions that you can also extend.
